description: A terrible application setting SV2 Efficiency Mode for inactive Windows apps and user background apps.
notes: Start EnergyStar by running: nssm start EnergyStar
Stop EnergyStar by running: nssm stop EnergyStar
Restart EnergyStar by running: nssm restart EnergyStar
Querying the service's status by running: nssm status EnergyStar
post_install: Start-Process PowerShell -Verb RunAs "-NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command `"nssm install EnergyStar '$dir\EnergyStar.exe'; nssm set EnergyStar Start SERVICE_DELAYED_AUTO_START; nssm set 'Bedrock Server' AppPriority BELOW_NORMAL_PRIORITY_CLASS`""
